name: Total Tank Turmoil!
description:
A retro style top-down tank shooter survival game in which you have to survive as many waves as you possibly can by killing enemy tanks while also replenishing supplies such as ammo, shields and repair kits...

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows for movement
  • Space for shoot
  • E to activate a shield (Lasts for 10 seconds or 3 hits)

(Developed for LOWREZJAM 2020)
